detail_desc: Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Low crotch and tapered legs with wide, elasticated ribbing at the hems.

Boiler suit in washed cotton twill with contrasting colour seams. Grandad collar, press-studs down the front and a tab on the chest. Wide, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets, back pockets with a press-stud, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem, and an adjustable tab and press-stud at the hems.

Short dungaree dress in sturdy washed cotton denim with wide straps that taper at the back and fasten with a button. Zip fly and button, side pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and fake flap pockets at the back.

Short dungaree dress in sturdy washed cotton denim with wide straps that taper at the back and fasten with a button. Zip fly and button, side pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and fake flap pockets at the back.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats at the front of the waistband, a zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats at the front of the waistband, a zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats at the front of the waistband, a zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Shorts in imitation leather with a high waist, pleats at the top, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, decorative welt back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Earrings in metal and plastic with a large, rectangular pendant. Length 4.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved top in sturdy, block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Oversized shirt jacket in sturdy wool with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Long, padded gilet in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, padded hood with press-studs at the front, a stand-up collar, and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, front pockets, and a concealed elastic drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined. The polyester content of the gilet is recycled.
Straight-cut jacket in a textured weave with frayed edges. Notch lapels, a button at the front, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Hi-tops in grained imitation leather with top section and high tongue in imitation suede, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles. Platform 4 cm.

Fully-fashioned trainers containing glittery threads with details in plastic and imitation leather. Elasticated top edge, a loop front and back, and elasticated lacing with a drawstring at the top. Mesh insoles and patterned soles.
Round-necked vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck trimmed with a flounce that continues down to the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an elasticated waist. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved romper suit in sturdy organic cotton jersey with a jersey-lined hood and buttons down the front. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs. (except in sizes 1-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and hems.
